summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Criminal Code and to weapons control; amending Section 12A.14.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code to define aerosol tear gas personal protection device, amending Section 12A.14.080 of the Seattle Municipal Code relating to the unlawful use of weapons, and amending Section 12A.14.090 of the Seattle Municipal Code to create an affirmative defense for the possession and sale of aerosol tear gas personal protection devices by persons eighteen years or older.
